Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't kid yourself; the guy who's onstage in ripped-up jeans is wearing as much a costume as I am

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: Gene sometimes... well, he has his dream list

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody with money can put on a KISS show, but they can't be KISS

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had my way, I'd always be onstage. But I won't always be able to be onstage

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Winter is a season of recovery and preparation

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: When I went to Hong Kong, I knew at once I wanted to write a story set there

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot make my days longer so I strive to make them better

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I understand passion. Love is something else

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Gain a modest reputation for being unreliable and you will never be asked to do a thing

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't write about a friend, you can only write about a former friend

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I am happy being what I am

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel is glamorous only in retrospect

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Hawaii is not a state of mind, but a state of grace

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Screenwriting is like ironing. You move forward a little bit and go back and smooth things out

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll rebel against powers and principalities, all the time. Always, I will

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: No, really. Just do it. You have some kind of weird reasons that are okay

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a feeling, one of those gut feelings, that I'll make pretty good movies the rest of my life

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course, I'm no dummy

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be the angry guy

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: How do I respond to criticism? Critically. I listen to all criticism critically

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am always looking for that nuance, that moment of truth, and you can't really do that fast

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is the hardest job in the entire world. By far. Harder than ditch digging

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Film school is a complete con, because the information is there if you want it

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: Boredom is rage spread thin

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: Cruelty towards others is always also cruelty towards ourselves

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: The first duty of love is to listen

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no love which does not become help

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: Astonishment is the root of philosophy

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope for the day when everyone can speak again of God without embarrassment

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is an act of a finite being who is grasped by, and turned to, the infinite

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: A poem is never finished, only abandoned

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: We are enriched by our reciprocate differences

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: That which has always been accepted by everyone, everywhere, is almost certain to be false

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: An artist never really finishes his work, he merely abandons it

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: Books have the same enemies as people: fire, humidity, animals, weather, and their own content

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of psychology is to give us a completely different idea of the things we know best

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: At times I think and at times I am

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is being stupid together

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is infinitely more complicated than his thoughts

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: Serious-minded people have few ideas. People with ideas are never serious

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the hurdles aren't really hurdles at all. They're welcome challenges, tests

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid of anything. That's just the way I am

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what it is in life: listen to your heart. If you do, no matter what, you win

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: My philosophy is: If you can't have fun, there's no sense in doing it

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: If you spend any time with a man, you'll realize that we're all still little boys

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom's hot. I mean she's old, but my mom's out of control

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not about working anymore, its about doing work I can be proud of

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted to race cars, ever since I was a young boy, as I think a lot of guys have

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Attitude is attitude, whether you're a West Coast gangster or East Coast gangster, you know?

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my mom put it best. She said, 'Little girls soften their daddy's hearts.'

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: The most powerful weapon in the world, as far as I'm concerned, is the camera

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Ships are expendable; the whales are not

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not establish the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society as a protest organisation

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sea Shepherd is to terrorism what Groucho was to Marxism

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: All confrontation is based on deception

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't get anywhere unless you've had a little bit of a complicated life

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: No species is more important than others

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Protesting against illegal activity is not piracy

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sustainable fishing is a fraud. It's a marketing term that really means 'business as usual.'

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm thankful to have time to write

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't live a lie. You have to follow your heart

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: I think politicians are so far out of step with what people really want

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing wrong with pop!

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: People say that if you're still angry at 52, you're not an angry young man, just a grumpy old git

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: I still love playing music. It was all I ever wanted to do, and I got the chance to do it

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: It is nice to make a record and people like it, and it's encouraging

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm dead, I wanna leave a body of work, like authors or great painters do

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're into a certain band, you're into the way they dress

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like the royal family, I don't like the establishment, I don't like the civil service

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: Led Zeppelin would never have reformed if he or Jimmy Page were bald

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Never separate the life you live from the words you speak

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: We all do better when we all do better

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is not about power

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to change is to vote. People are responsible

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics isn't about big money or power games; it's about the improvement of people's lives

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Education and democracy have the same goal: the fullest possible development of human capabilities

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Our aims in political activism are not, and should not be, to create a perfect utopia

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: We can and must move U.S. politics forward by means of committed participation

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: We can remake the world daily

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: 'American Idol' has taken over my whole life

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep the faith, don't lose your perseverance and always trust your gut extinct

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: If they're singing about heartbreak, they've lived it

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: Find fitness with fun dancing. It is fun and makes you forget about the dreaded exercise

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: Simon would not want to audition in front of Simon

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: The more auditions you go on, the more you will learn not to take it personally

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: When people expect me to go right, I'll go left. I'm unpredictable

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: Your talent is your art. It is not to be taken for granted

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happily single

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: All you can do is the best you can do

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever someone dies everyone says, I love that guy, except for Jeffrey Dahmer

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the best comedy comes from stuff that's based in reality

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm definitely a lot more comfortable now in my 40s than in my 30s - that's for sure

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: I giggle when I put myself down. It's just funny to me

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not used to getting good reviews

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: People should stop poking fun at other people and worry about themselves

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: When you put yourself out into the world and say, 'Hey, look at me,' you're going to get criticized

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy wasn't something I chose - it chose me. I was just inherently funny when I was a kid

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the biggest rule in Hollywood: Don't spend your own money

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't go out every night to red-carpet events

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: Be true to yourself and surround yourself with positive, supportive people

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: Surround yourself with people who lift you higher

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: Surround yourself with people who only lift you higher

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: Having challenges in your life open doors for you

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: I get bursts of creativity with bursts of physical activity

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: Working out is so mentally and physically important

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst thing you can do is sit there and do nothing, right?

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: The impact we have on people's lives, to me, is more important than any title anyone can carry

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: I want little girls to believe that they can be CEOs

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe you win the race by looking forward, not behind

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all cells in the same body of humanity

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: This is the way of peace: Overcome evil with good, falsehood with truth, and hatred with love

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't eat junk foods and I don't think junk thoughts

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: As I lived up to the highest light I had, higher and higher light came to me

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: For light I go directly to the Source of light, not to any of the reflections

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: The way of peace is the way of love. Love is the greatest power on earth. It conquers all things

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: Worry is a useless mulling over of things we cannot change

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: A pilgrim is a wanderer with a purpose

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: You are within God. God is within you

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: A crown, if it hurts us, is not worth wearing

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: To talk to someone who does not listen is enough to tense the devil

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: What the world really needs is more love and less paper work

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: People see God every day, they just don't recognize him

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: You never find yourself until you face the truth

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can figure out your worth but you

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Hungry people cannot be good at learning or producing anything, except perhaps violence

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: We look into mirrors but we only see the effects of our times on us - not our effects on others

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're young, the silliest notions seem the greatest achievements

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: The first and worst of all frauds is to cheat one's self. All sin is easy after that

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Love alone could waken love

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: To find joy in work is to discover the fountain of youth

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-expression must pass into communication for its fulfillment

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Praise out of season, or tactlessly bestowed, can freeze the heart as much as blame

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Love dies only when growth stops

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: One faces the future with one's past

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Hunger makes a thief of any man

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: When good people in any country cease their vigilance and struggle, then evil men prevail

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: If our American way of life fails the child, it fails us all

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot live your life looking at yourself from someone else's point of view

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: My ambition is to be happy

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a strong personality, and I say what I think

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing that I am proud of: I am really capable of laughing at myself

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know why, but women in a hair salon share their deepest secrets

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: Calcutta is like another world. People there are very special and grateful

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: Madrid is what I call home, but also the States

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Spanish food. My diet is the Mediterranean diet, which is good food. I eat well

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if I believe in marriage. I believe in family, love and children

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't go to places where you're going to find more attention. I go to the opposite

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never had a drink of alcohol or any drug in my life

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to talk about magic, the stuff that blows me away is the stuff that's done close up

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the media spends a lot of time fooling itself

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: I came to magic absolutely hating magic on a very, very deep level

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people under age 55 come to Vegas with a certain sense of irony

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: Magic is the Special Olympics of entertainment

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is taken care of by a free market

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: Poker has the feeling of a sport, but you don't have to do push-ups

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: If you spend a lot of time lying to people, you think a lot about what the truth means

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: We celebrities are desperate pigs

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not having a good time, find something else that gives you some joy in life

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: I do feel it's important to entertain people. I try to

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't like a girly girl. I was a tomboy

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: You had to learn at a certain age what sarcasm is, you know?

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: Yankee Stadium was the only thing we had in the Bronx. It was an institution

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a strange combination of fearlessness and massive insecurity

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: I like arts and crafts

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the most positive person

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a good support system of friends and family

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: I do talk like a truck driver sometimes, or I curse. What can I say?

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: In football, the worst things are excuses. Excuses mean you cannot grow or move forward

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sorry, but until my last day as a coach, I will try to play from my goalkeeper

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: We need the whole squad, every player of the team, if we are to be successful

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: The Premier League is so difficult

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think in the big clubs in Europe you can find three strikers with an average age of 20

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: The most difficult thing in football is to score a goal

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: The people say I have to change? Well, the people have to tell me what I should do to change

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: People want to be entertained. They don't want to be cheated

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to feel the team is playing like I want. If not, why am I here?

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: A perfectionist? That's part of my job

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: History is a cyclic poem written by time upon the memories of man

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: A poet is a nightingale, who sits in darkness and sings to cheer its own solitude with sweet sounds

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: I have drunken deep of joy, And I will taste no other wine tonight

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: If Winter comes, can Spring be far behind?

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: War is the statesman's game, the priest's delight, the lawyer's jest, the hired assassin's trade

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing wilts faster than laurels that have been rested upon

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: Our sweetest songs are those that tell of saddest thought

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: Familiar acts are beautiful through love

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw how hard my parents worked, and I didn't want to be a freeloader

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: How do you defend inaction in the face of crisis? How is that defensible for anybody?

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: A robust democracy requires active participation

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm confident in my strengths. I'm prepared to jump any hurdle

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to empower people who think like you do

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: PACs don't vote in the district; people do

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: Every decision I make in Congress will be centered on the needs of the district

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't come to Washington to be part of the problem

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned long ago you run unopposed, or you run scared

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama's very unpopular. I don't need a poll to tell me that

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: If it's a beautiful day, I love taking walks. The walks are always aimless

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: Confession alone is not necessarily good for the soul

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is so entwined with my being that I can't imagine a life without it

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so concerned with morgues and libraries of the newspapers

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: The replenishing thing that comes with a nap - you end up with two mornings in a day

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: Any of us who've been newspapermen for a long time hate generalizations

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: Journalism is a team sport. Writing novels is golf: it's you and the ball

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody needs an editor

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: Writers are rememberers

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to have something in your life you don't sell to others

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: If somebody is gracious enough to give me a second chance, I won't need a third

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd walk through hell in a gasoline suit to play baseball

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody's gotta win and somebody's gotta lose and I believe in letting the other guy lose

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how many times you say you're sorry, somebody is not going to hear you

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: See the ball; hit the ball

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, when you don't have spark, someone in the dugout has to create something

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I love WWE

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a round ball and a round bat, and you got to hit it square

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: Am I still in uniform? Then I ain't retired

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just like everybody else. I have two arms, two legs and four-thousand hits

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: All I cared about in tennis was winning

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: I could be a jerk and get a lot more publicity, but that's not who I am

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: I am going to hold serve the majority of the time. It is nice to have a little time to return serve

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate to lose, and I do whatever I can to win, and if it is ugly, it is ugly

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: It is nice to walk out on a court to have it packed

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: You kind of live and die by the serve

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know how I do it, I really don't

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm staying in shape, working out

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got a great wife, a great life

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: Golfers are forever working on mechanics. My tennis swing hasn't changed in 10 years

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to turn the clock back to when people lived in small villages and took care of each other

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's something wrong, speak up!

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: I fought for peace in the fifties

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that my whole life is a contribution

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a very important thing to learn to talk to people you disagree with

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: Songs won't save the planet, but neither will books or speeches

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: Being generous of spirit is a wonderful way to live

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is when you read the fine print. Experience is what you get if you don't

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: Historically, I believe I was correct in refusing to answer their questions

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: Again, I say I will be glad to tell what songs I have ever sung, because singing is my business

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: We tried not to age, but time had its rage

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an ordinary day for Brian. Like, he died every day, you know

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: It's like the mod thing is happening again

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm only interested in rites of passage stories

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of my audience are in their 50s. But they want me to pretend to continue to be pretending

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: I know how it feels to be a woman because I am a woman. And I won't be classified as just a man
